level.text: 6315.1 The Board may audit up to twenty percent (20%) of the number oficensees to determine compliance with the continuing education contact hourequirements.
6315.2 Upon notification by the Board that a licensee has been selected for anudit, the licensee shall submit the required documentation within thirty30) days of receipt of the notice.
Source: A Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3133, 3143 (April 20,012).
